ServiceInfoResponseAction.name: ServiceInfoResponseAction
ServiceInfoResponseAction.description: Represents actions to be performed as suggested by a service information response.

Context.description: The context in which the action is performed.

ContextIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the context.

Description.description: The description of the service information response action.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the record.

ResponseReferenceRecordId.description: The record of the object that's related to the service information response action.

Type.description: Specifies the type of action to be performed.
